name: The first "Hello world" program
instruction:
Output the phrase "Hello world" to the console.

To do this, type the command:
```
console.log('Hello world');
```
After that press the `Validate solution` button.

If error messages appear in the window to the right, correct them.

If the green mark `passed` appears in the window on the right, it means that you have done everything correctly.

Then press the `Submit` button.

The task is considered completed (a green marking `Completed` will appear next to the task name).
